attributes.action: give benefits to hard working, life long tax payers who are now out of work.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
british born citizens like myself who have worked all there life,payed there taxes to the crown should have more rights to benefits than those who choose never to work.
i have worked for 21 years since leaving school as a bricklayer, now unemployed the benefits office says i am not entitled to anything because my wife earns one hundred and eighty six pounds per week.
after earning 30-40000 per year and paying my taxes i feel let down and feel this country will let my 2 year old son down later in life.
can you also justify why the state are giving mobility cars to people from asia who have only lived in england for 2 years.
disgraceful.
